Format: ISO

Description:
Written by the legendary graphic novel artist Joe Madureira (X-Men, Battle Chasers, The Ultimates), Darksiders: Wrath of War is set in post-apocalyptic world ravaged by demons which evil forces have prematurely brought to time.
Originally sent to oversee the destruction of the Earth, the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse have been betrayed by their master, stripped of their powers and cast down to Earth.
Assumes the role of WAR, the first of four riders, in their brutal quest for revenge against the forces that betrayed him with the help of his phantom steed RUIN.
Darksiders features open-world exploration, a deep combat system and an arsenal of modern and mythical weapons.
